products.name: Cat Scratcher Post
products.description: This cat scratcher post is perfect for keeping your cat's nails trimmed and providing them with a place to play and exercise. It is made of durable materials and features a variety of different textures to keep your cat entertained.

products.name: Cat Tree
products.description: This cat tree is the perfect place for your cat to climb, scratch, and play. It features multiple levels with different activities, including a scratching post, a hammock, and a perch.
